definition: variant of 喧[xuan1]/old variant of 諼|谖[xuan1]
noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke

sentences.english: The children were making too much noise, and he faced them down.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们喧闹不堪，他板起面孔把他们镇住了。

sentences.english: Let go hand in a noisy streets, find the pupil picture www. anhuiqq. cn.
sentences.chinese: 放开手在喧闹的大街，找不到瞳孔中的画面。

sentences.english: Noise distracts our attention from studying.
sentences.chinese: 喧闹声分散我们学习的注意力。

sentences.english: The infinite sky is motionless overhead and the restless water is boisterous.
sentences.chinese: 头上是静止的无垠的天空，不宁的海波奔腾喧闹。

sentences.english: Each voice, rising and falling like the clamorous cackling of chickens.
sentences.chinese: 此起彼落的声音犹如小鸡咯咯的喧闹声。

sentences.english: The colony whines in a centerless loud drone that vibrates the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 蜂群嗡嗡喧闹的哀鸣振动邻里。

sentences.english: And only herald to the gaudy spring.
sentences.chinese: 还只是喧闹春天的传令兵。

sentences.english: Walking around West Lake is supremely pleasant after the buzz of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 在经历了上海的喧闹之后，在西湖边走是极端的享受。

sentences.english: This will be seen as pointlessly annoying .
sentences.chinese: 这将被视为无意义的喧闹。

sentences.english: I've had enough of the noisiness here.
The data suggest that Leptospira prefers the excitement of the big city.
sentences.chinese: 数据暗示钩端螺旋体更喜欢呆在喧闹的大城市。

sentences.english: The brick of the dusty courtyard homes filtered the thunder from the bars. There are very few lights in a hutong at night.
sentences.chinese: 透过四合院的砖墙传出了里面喧闹的酒吧的声音。
收音机发出喧闹的声音。

sentences.english: Avoid loud and aggressive persons, they are vexatious to the spirit.
sentences.chinese: 避开喧闹寻衅者，他们会扰人心神。

sentences.english: Everlasting SongThere are slight ripples of ice over the lake, where she has taken her boat.
sentences.chinese: 永恒之歌她在微弱响彻冰的喧闹声的湖上下了船。

sentences.english: The audience collectively begins to discern a "5" in the noise.
sentences.chinese: 喧闹声中，观众们开始共同辨认出一个“5”。

definition: lit. a boiling cauldron of voices (idiom)/hubbub/brouhaha
